item.title: Docker Infrastructure Project
item.author: shadowimmage@gmail.com (Chase Sawyer)
item.description: I’m building a web infrastructure project that’s based around the project verbose-equals-true (referred to as VET from now on), which sets out to create a set of services to support modern web apps, using several Docker based images to collect everything into separate concerns. I like the philosophy behind the project, and it looks well thought out, however, as things are always changing in this landscape and nobody has the same development environment, there’s always going to be stumbling blocks.
